r.d: With Parle, it is possible to implement lexing and parsing in PHP while relying on features and principles of the parser/lexer generator tools for C/C++.
r.n: - Package fixes by Remi Collet - Introduced Token class - Lexer methods skip(), eoi() and npos() are transformed into constants and are available in the Token class as SKIP, EOI and UNKNOWN constants - Introduced ErrorInfo class
